inclusion.criterion: Clinical diagnosis of stage 2-5 Chronic Kidney Disease
inclusion.label: met

inclusion.criterion: Willingness and ability to provide informed consent and assent
inclusion.label: met

exclusion.criterion: Children less than 1 year of age
exclusion.label: not_met

exclusion.criterion: Current pregnancy or pregnancy within the last 12 months
exclusion.label: not_met

notes: Patient has chronic kidney disease and is between 1-21 years of age. No exclusion criteria apply.
